An Educational News Snippet

From the Mineralogical Society, 41 Queen's Gate. LONDON SW7 5HR

1. An exciting educational page for children has been put on their web site at
http://www.minersoc.org

where children are invited to visit the Dragon's Cave to search for minerals by moving the mouse pointer around the cave which is completely black apart from the dragon's eyes. When the mouse moves over a 'find' a star appears and the child sees a picture of the mineral accompanied by details of where it can be found, it's composition, etc.

2. The image below shows a picture from their 'Mineral Gallery' with thier 'Mineral of the Month'
